sentences.en: A sensory or tactile organ, such as an antenna a tentacle, or a barbel.
sentences.cn: 触角,触须感觉或触觉器官, 例如触角、触手或触须.

sentences.en: Free speech is being gradually eroded year after year by new tentacles of government control.
sentences.cn: 言论自由正被政府控制的新触角逐渐侵蚀。

sentences.en: I see Draeni ( who I predicted ) who now look like blue handsome tentacle people.
sentences.cn: 我看到了这些德莱尼人 ( 我已经预测到了是这样 ),他们看起来是群长着触须的蓝皮肤帅哥和美女.

sentences.en: Shape like a bell, short tentacle, with a nearly transparent yellow body.
sentences.cn: 长得象个小铃铛, 有短短的触角, 和近乎透明的身体. 这描述真是太可爱了.

sentences.en: The exquisite hand rack may places the handset the tentacle to be possible and the place.
sentences.cn: 精巧的手机架可以将手机放在触手可及的地方.

sentences.en: The tentacle may and be only a pseudomorph, unbearable admonishes Italy.
sentences.cn: 触手可及只是假象 、 咫尺天涯才是箴意.

sentences.en: The tentacle was now some way across the room, twisting and turning with queer sudden movements.
sentences.cn: 那只触爪现已横扫过房间的一段地方, 扭来转去,动作怪异而突兀.

sentences.en: Use: Summons a Vanquished Tentacle to your aid for 30 seconds.
sentences.cn: 使用: 召唤一根被击败的触须为你作战,持续30秒.

trans.tran_en: one of the long thin parts of a sea creature such as an  octopus  which it uses for holding things
